November 26, 2024 - Amazon Basics (formerly written as AmazonBasics) is a private label that offers home goods, office supplies, and tech accessories. The line was launched in 2009. As of December 2017, Amazon Basics is the best-selling private label brand on Amazon.com. In November 2018, AmazonBasics expanded ...

1 week ago - A project 18 months, 15 global markets, and over 50 sub-brands in the making. As Amazon scaled at extraordinary speed, the brand system sometimes struggled to deliver creative excellence at speed, fragmented across teams, regions, and experiences.

t: Requirements and tips for enrolling a brand in Amazon Brand Registry - Sell on Amazon
s: June 4, 2024 - Before you enroll your brand in Amazon Brand Registry, review eligibility requirements and other key information.
Enroll your brand in Amazon Brand Registry to become eligible to activate a suite of brand-building tools and protection benefits.
